entries.title: The PC is getting weird again - and that's exactly what we need
entries.description: It's time to say goodbye to the little rectangles that have ruled our lives for too long.

entries.title: Supermarkets using facial recognition to check booze-buyers' age? Oh, the flattery
entries.description: Can software correctly estimate your age when you're buying a bottle of wine? Some famous supermarkets have been trying it out.

entries.title: Southwest Airlines pilots to disastrous bosses: It's your education, stupid
entries.description: When too many executives have the same education and think alike, it may be a recipe for disaster. Or, at least, for a systemic catastrophe.

entries.title: One of America's most hated companies hired a security robot. It didn't go well
entries.description: Robot security guards may be cheaper than the human version. But there are still, it appears, problems.
